title: Add "Contact Us" item to the navbar

requirements.text: Add a new "Contact Us" navigation item to the site header navigation (desktop and mobile) that routes to the existing "/contact" page, using the existing i18n label key "nav.contact".
acceptanceCriteria: The header navbar shows a "Contact Us" item in the desktop navigation.
The mobile (sheet) navigation also includes a "Contact Us" item.
Clicking/tapping the "Contact Us" item navigates to the existing route "/contact" and renders the existing ContactUs page.
The nav item label is sourced from i18n using the existing key "nav.contact" (do not hardcode the string).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*.
nonGoals: Do not create a new Contact Us page or change the existing "/contact" route.
Do not change backend canister logic or add new backend APIs.
